title: UK Woman Prison Officer Charged After Sex Video With Inmate Goes Viral
content: A woman prison officer in the UK has been charged following the discovery of a social media video allegedly showing her having sex with an inmate at HMP Wandsworth, a prison in southwest London, a report said.
summary: A woman prison officer in the UK has been charged following the discovery of a social media video allegedly showing her having sex with an inmate at HMP Wandsworth, a prison in southwest London, a report said.

title: Rishi Sunak To Keir Starmer, Key Contenders In UK General Elections
content: The United Kingdom heads to the polls on Thursday in a general election that is expected to see the main opposition Labour Party return to power after 14 years.
summary: The United Kingdom heads to the polls on Thursday in a general election that is expected to see the main opposition Labour Party return to power after 14 years.

title: US Supreme Court's Ruling "For The Ages" On Donald Trump Likely Today
content: The US Supreme Court is expected to rule Monday on the most highly anticipated decision of its term -- a ruling "for the ages" on whether Donald Trump, as a former president, is immune from prosecution.
summary: The US Supreme Court is expected to rule Monday on the most highly anticipated decision of its term -- a ruling "for the ages" on whether Donald Trump, as a former president, is immune from prosecution.

title: 6 Killed, Many Houses Destroyed As Israeli Tanks Advance Into North Gaza
content: Israeli forces advanced further on Sunday into the Shejaia neighbourhood of northern Gaza and also pushed deeper into western and central Rafah in the south, killing at least six Palestinians and destroying several homes, residents said.
summary: Israeli forces advanced further on Sunday into the Shejaia neighbourhood of northern Gaza and also pushed deeper into western and central Rafah in the south, killing at least six Palestinians and destroying several homes, residents said.

title: France's Far Right Wins 1st Round Of Election In Blow To Macron
content: France's far right was on Sunday eyeing a historic chance to form a government and claim the post of prime minister after winning the first round of legislative elections with the centrist forces of President Emmanuel Macron coming in only third.
summary: France's far right was on Sunday eyeing a historic chance to form a government and claim the post of prime minister after winning the first round of legislative elections with the centrist forces of President Emmanuel Macron coming in only third.

title: Biden Allies Reject Calls For Him Dropping Out Of Presidential Race
content: While President Joe Biden was away at Camp David for a long-planned family get-together, key US Democratic leaders stood firmly behind his back, rejecting the notion that he should end his 2024 campaign.
summary: While President Joe Biden was away at Camp David for a long-planned family get-together, key US Democratic leaders stood firmly behind his back, rejecting the notion that he should end his 2024 campaign.

title: UK Government, British Airways Sued Over 1990 Kuwait Hostage Flight
content: Passengers and crew of a British Airways flight who were taken hostage in Kuwait in 1990 have launched legal action against the UK government and the airline, a law firm said Monday.
summary: Passengers and crew of a British Airways flight who were taken hostage in Kuwait in 1990 have launched legal action against the UK government and the airline, a law firm said Monday.

title: North Korea Fires 2 Ballistic Missiles At South Korea
content: North Korea on Monday launched two ballistic missiles, South Korea's military confirmed -- the latest in a series of weapons tests by Pyongyang that have soured relations with Seoul.
summary: North Korea on Monday launched two ballistic missiles, South Korea's military confirmed -- the latest in a series of weapons tests by Pyongyang that have soured relations with Seoul.

title: Experts Blame Bad Preparation, Exhaustion For Biden's Debate Performance
content: President Joe Biden's train-wreck debate with opponent Donald Trump followed a series of decisions by his most senior advisers that critics now point to as wrong-headed, interviews with Democratic allies, donors and former and current aides.
summary: President Joe Biden's train-wreck debate with opponent Donald Trump followed a series of decisions by his most senior advisers that critics now point to as wrong-headed, interviews with Democratic allies, donors and former and current aides.

title: South Africa Government Formed After Tough Coalition Deal With Opposition
content: South African president Cyril Ramaphosa announced his new government on Sunday with the opposition receiving 12 out of 32 portfolios following tough coalition negotiations after the ruling ANC lost its outright parliamentary majority.
summary: South African president Cyril Ramaphosa announced his new government on Sunday with the opposition receiving 12 out of 32 portfolios following tough coalition negotiations after the ruling ANC lost its outright parliamentary majority.

title: 3-Way Run-Offs And Horse-Trading: What Happens Next In French Elections
content: Here's how the second round of France's parliamentary election on July 7 will work and the possible scenarios after exit polls showed Marine Le Pen's far-right National Rally (RN) party had won Sunday's first round.
summary: Here's how the second round of France's parliamentary election on July 7 will work and the possible scenarios after exit polls showed Marine Le Pen's far-right National Rally (RN) party had won Sunday's first round.

title: Isolated Macron Stung By French Voters' Revenge In Snap Elections
content: Emmanuel Macron has taken many risks in a political career marked by countless crises but his decision to call snap elections may be one too many, marring his legacy and ushering in an era of extremes.
summary: Emmanuel Macron has taken many risks in a political career marked by countless crises but his decision to call snap elections may be one too many, marring his legacy and ushering in an era of extremes.

title: Far-Right Leads First Round Of France Election, Show Exit Polls
content: Marine Le Pen's far-right National Rally (RN) party emerged ahead in the first round of France's parliamentary elections on Sunday, exit polls showed, but the unpredictable final result will depend on days of horsetrading before next week's run-off.
summary: Marine Le Pen's far-right National Rally (RN) party emerged ahead in the first round of France's parliamentary elections on Sunday, exit polls showed, but the unpredictable final result will depend on days of horsetrading before next week's run-off.

title: 3 Killed In Light Aircraft Crash On Motorway Outside Paris: Cops
content: Three people were killed on Sunday when their light aircraft crashed onto a motorway east of Paris, the police and gendarmerie said.
summary: Three people were killed on Sunday when their light aircraft crashed onto a motorway east of Paris, the police and gendarmerie said.

title: Trump Geniune Threat: Biden Seeks To Repair Debate Damage With Fiery Speech
content: A fired-up Joe Biden came out swinging Friday as he tried to make up for a disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump, insisting he was the right man to win November's US presidential election.
summary: A fired-up Joe Biden came out swinging Friday as he tried to make up for a disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump, insisting he was the right man to win November's US presidential election.

title: Caribbean On Alert For "Extremely Dangerous'" Hurricane Beryl
content: Much of the southeast Caribbean was on alert Sunday as Beryl strengthened into the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, with forecasters warning of an "extremely dangerous" Category 4 storm.
summary: Much of the southeast Caribbean was on alert Sunday as Beryl strengthened into the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, with forecasters warning of an "extremely dangerous" Category 4 storm.

title: 1 Dead, Baby Among 9 Injured In Ukraine Post Office Bombing
content: One person was killed and nine others including a baby were injured Sunday in a strike on a post office in Ukraine's second city Kharkiv, local authorities said.
summary: One person was killed and nine others including a baby were injured Sunday in a strike on a post office in Ukraine's second city Kharkiv, local authorities said.

title: Democrats Rally Behind Biden After Shaky Debate Performance With Trump
content: Democratic leaders rallied Sunday behind US President Joe Biden following his poor debate performance last week, as the White House denied a report he was meeting with family to assess his candidacy.
summary: Democratic leaders rallied Sunday behind US President Joe Biden following his poor debate performance last week, as the White House denied a report he was meeting with family to assess his candidacy.

title: Special Education Teacher In US Charged With Sexually Assaulting Student
content: She was arrested after an investigation revealed that she allegedly began sexually abusing her student earlier this year.
summary: She was arrested after an investigation revealed that she allegedly began sexually abusing her student earlier this year.

title: S Jaishankar Discusses Trade, Technology, Global Issues With Qatar's PM
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday met Qatar's PM Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani and reviewed bilateral relationship, with a focus on political, trade, investment, energy, technology, culture and people-to-people ties.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday met Qatar's PM Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani and reviewed bilateral relationship, with a focus on political, trade, investment, energy, technology, culture and people-to-people ties.
